page.title: 03Industry.
page.content: Although Bruton is mainly an agricultural community, there are a number of light industries in the twon. Based around Station Road is a small industrial estate, where there is a large antique warehouse, specialising in the export of antiques to America and Australia, a garden centre, a vehicle body shop, a heavy plant hire firm, and a coach hire firm. Elsewhere in the town, is a seed mill, which (apart from the schools) is one of the main employers, and sends its products to farmers throughout the West Country. There is also a firm of agricultural hauliers, which transports cattle and sheep to all manner of destinations. There is a small pottery, a shop specialising in the restoration of antique furniture and clocks, and a cabinet maker.
